action.action-desc: Mr. Norman (for himself and Mr. Gosar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act and Food Security Act of 1985 to enact reforms to farm subsidies and crop insurance called for in President Trump’s budget for fiscal year 2019.

subsection.text: This Act may be cited as the President Trump's Farm Bill Reforms Act of 2018.
The table of contents for this Act is as follows:

title.header: Eligibility Requirements for Farm Subsidy Payments

section.header: Adjusted gross income limits for crop insurance premium subsidies
section.text: Section 508(e) of the Federal Crop Insurance Act (7 U.S.C. 1508(e)), as amended by section 101, is further amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: A producer shall not be eligible to obtain premium assistance for a crop year under this subsection if the average adjusted gross income (as defined in section 1001D of the Food Security Act of 1985 (7 U.S.C. 1308–3a)) of such producer exceeds $500,000 for the preceding crop year.

section.header: Adjusted gross income limits for commodity and conservation programs
section.text: Section 1001D(b)(1) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (7 U.S.C. 1308–3a(b)(1)) is amended by striking $900,000 and inserting $500,000.
Section 1001A(b) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (7 U.S.C. 1308–1) is amended by adding the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: With respect to a farming operation, no more than one person shall qualify as a farm manager actively engaged in farming for purposes of receiving a payment described in subsection (b) or (c) of section 1001.

title.header: Target Rate of Return for Insurance Companies

section.header: Reducing target rate of return for insurance companies
section.text: Section 508(k)(3) of the Federal Crop Insurance Act (7 U.S.C. 1508(k)(3)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (3) Share of risk.—The and inserting the following:

subparagraph.text: The

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.header: Limitation on average rate of return
subparagraph.text: The target average rate of return for reinsured companies for the 2018 reinsurance year and each subsequent reinsurance year shall be 12 percent of retained premiums.
